title: 2018 NFL Draft Rumors - Draft Day is here! (Football 04/26)
description:
The 2018 NFL Draft is finally here, after months and months of waiting, and CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora joins Will Brinson to break down everything he's hearing in terms of rumors and movement on draft boards. JLC reveals a wide receiver who could be a first-round pick but not for off-field problems, the guys debate whether Baker Mayfield could actually end up going No. 1 overall to the Cleveland Browns, La Canfora explains the plan for the Patriots to end up with three first-round picks and possibly a quarterback and they run through all the rumors surrounding the draft.

itunes:subtitle: Jason La Canfora joins Will Brinson to discuss the latest on the NFL Draft rumors, the chances of the Browns taking Baker Mayfield and what the Patriots' plan on draft day could be.
